issue.title: [Ruby] Add ability to read results of min_max compute function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15203](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15203). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Cannot read value from Arrow::StructScalar object
```java

f = Arrow::Function.find('min_max')
f.execute([table['revenue'].data]).value
#<Arrow::StructScalar:x11fcc8df8 ptr=x7ffd0ea762b0 {min:double = 0, max:double = 257.515735}> 
f.execute([table['revenue'].data]).value.value 
# []
```
